Reviews.Title: Best little camera with dual screens.
Reviews.Author: S. Raney "Stacy"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my son after he picked it out, and he loves it. He and his girlfriend take many pictures of themselves while out on the town, and they can see their background and if they are in the frame. Compact enough to put in his pocket and to take quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: C. Ta "wooter"
Reviews.Content: I have no idea what the person below me is talking about. This camera is the  best camera I've owned yet. The dual view is amazing and I usually take accurate photos with it on. I love the touch screen. Camera design is sleek and beautiful. Love love love the camera! My friend wants to buy the same one after trying mine out!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: JaVonni
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend bought this for me for christmas and looking into the screen of the camera made my old one look like trash. I love it

Reviews.Title: Christian
Reviews.Author: C. Anzorena "Chris Anz."
Reviews.Content: This is a great device, but it has two big issues that I have found so far:1.-Crappy quality at indoor images (even at highest resolution).2.-Battery life is very poor, this is because of its big screen, but it is very poor for a device like that. Samsung should have thought about it before release this product.

Reviews.Title: great quality camera.
Reviews.Author: Rudy Barajas
Reviews.Content: yeah i dont know what jen w. is talking about but the first thing i noticed about this beautiful camera was the clear crisp screen and HD pictures. i would recommend this camera as a not too pricy gift.:)

Reviews.Title: audio cut while zooming recording video *no solution from samsung*
Reviews.Author: Pablo M. Troche "PPP."
Reviews.Content: After I recorded a lot of videos in the U2 concert, I realized that the audio cuts while you are doing "zoom" when recording videos. All my videos are spoiled because of this issue.The funny part is that I contacted samsung and I did the "trouble shooting", where they know about this issue and clearly they solve it saying "do not use the zoom while recording a movie. If you need to use the zoom, use it before you begin recording.".I contacted Samsung twice by e-mail, and they always answer that they can't fix the problem and I can't send the camera for repairs. What is the solution? nothing.Since I don't take professional photos, I don't worry much if the pictures don't look perfect, but I worry about a basic functionality of the camera that doesn't work.I made a research about this issue on internet and I found the solution on youtube. This solution proves that customer service in Samsung is horrible and they not even know their products.For other people with this same problem, this is the solution: "zoom/mute issue is fixed by putting the camera in' "auto" video recording mode. Then go to "menu" and go to second screen 2/2 where you will see the option "Voice". The camera's default setting is "Zoom Mute" which is why the sound is muting while you zoom. Choose the middle "On" microphone and your zoom will no longer mute your videos:)"Thanks s4pro for solving this problem on youtube.Pablo

Reviews.Title: Pretty good little camera.
Reviews.Author: J. S. Wright "austin sue"
Reviews.Content: Not a bad camera for the price.  Some of the features are pretty complex, but  if you want to study them and get the most out of the camera, do so.The battery is kind of an uncommon one, if and when I have to replace it, may be a problem.

Reviews.Title: samsung st600
Reviews.Author: leortega
Reviews.Content: i'm more than happy with my camera,it really exceeded my expectations,even though it was an use item,the camera dint have a scratch on it,like it was never used before and the extras that came with it ,im more than happy with everything, not just the camera,im talking about everything i bought from AMAZON thanks again from Oregon

Reviews.Title: Samsung ST600 14MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: I RECEIVED THE PRODUCTS WITHOUT PROBLEM
Reviews.Content: product received in good time and we liked it because it was requested by me to give away and use

Reviews.Title: complete piece of shit
Reviews.Author: Joseph Wilde "i believe in dog"
Reviews.Content: crapped out after 6 months, hard to use, just a  crappy product.  Save your money and buy a nikon or panasonic

Reviews.Title: BEST CAMERA EVER!
Reviews.Author: usmcwife
Reviews.Content: I have had my camera before it even hit the shelves or online purchasing! It was special ordered for me as a Christmas gift! I have had no problems what so ever with it! I have a daughter so this camera has seen it's abused days and it still runs like i got it yesterday! The screen is scratch resistant and the quality of the pictures indoor and outdoor are breath taking! It has amazing features and settings even for a professional photographer such as myself! This camera is very well built. I have switched from expensive cameras to just this one and everything about it is worth the price! I LOVE THIS CAMERA! I have owned my share of cameras and this is the best BY FAR! Great job Samsung!

Reviews.Title: This is an awkward camera...
Reviews.Author: McGintie
Reviews.Content: I've owned this camera for 6 months and I really dislike most everything about it. If you're looking for a point and shoot with the flash used EVERYWHERE, this is the camera for you. If you want to take pictures in medium light without the flash, look elsewhere. Moreover, this is the least intuitive camera I've ever used. Navigating the various functions is frustrating to the point I just put it down. That, coupled with the fact that there is no user manual shipped with the purchase make this wasted money in my world.I'll be going back to the Canon PowerShot series.

Reviews.Title: Samsung ST600 Camera
Reviews.Author: Steven C. Brockett
Reviews.Content: The Samsung camera was a gift purchased for my daughter; the following is her evaluation. The Samsung ST600 takes very high quality pictures with great true to life value, chroma, and hue. The additional front view LCD display is a nice feature that I use often. The camera is very easy to use out of the box and is intuitive in its use and function. I am very happy with this camera especially when I compare its pictures to other compact cameras I have owned. I would purchase again if needed.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, 1 major flaw
Reviews.Author: N. Roy "Novi"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera in every which way possible, but unfortunately, when ur recording any video, while zooming in or out, the sound gets cut off. Apart from that, this is the best camera ever, and a crowd pleaser

Reviews.Title: Nice little camers
Reviews.Author: Marine01
Reviews.Content: Camera takes great pics and video. Motion shots can get a little blured it subject is moving quickly. The controls are a little touchy, trying to get the LCD on the front to work took a bit to figure out. You will catch yourself looking at the LCD when you snap your photo, makes it look like you are not looking at the camera in the picture. Just have to train yourself to look at the lense not the LCD.Pictures are very sharp, execlent color.Sound on the video is a little weak.Except for the touch screen being "very" sensitive, the perfect camera.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Camera
Reviews.Author: Jason A. Wilson "viggense"
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews for this camera and decided to buy it.  I have been very pleased with the picture quality and the ease of use.  After exploring the features, it is pretty easy to use.  I love the fully auto mode that adjusts photo settings based on the picture.  The only thing I found I miss is a panaromic assist function.  Otherwise, great camera.

Reviews.Title: Fun Camera
Reviews.Author: K. Hurst "Tinman"
Reviews.Content: This little camera is amazing.  My wife and I love to take self portraits while traveling.  This camera is great.  There is no guessing if we are in the frame. We don't like to ask other people to take the picture, so this camera is perfect for us.  The pictures were very clear.  The only issue we had with the camera was battery life.  But, I think this may have been due to my wife leaving it on in her purse.

Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE.  DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA!!!
Reviews.Author: Jen W.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for myself to take pictures for Christmas.  I had the camera ONE DAY and as soon as I would turn on the front LCD it would turn all of the pictures BLUE.  It was never working properly.  I stopped turning on the front LCD because it was making everything blue in color.  A week later when I turned it on the screen was completely scrambled and I couldn't see anything. I decided to send the camera back as SAMSUNG said it came with a 1 year warranty for parts and labor.  When I called and explained what had happened they told me no problem and it would be covered.  After having my camera for TWO WEEKS they called me back and told me that it would not be covered and it was physical damage on my part that caused the camera to malfunction.  The camera was never dropped, never damaged on my part.  This camera is a PIECE OF JUNK and never worked properly.  AVOID this camera and any Samsung product at all cost.  THIS CAMERA WAS A WASTE OF MONEY AND SAMSUNG IS A JOKE OF A COMPANY.

Reviews.Title: fisheye
Reviews.Author: Al Michaels
Reviews.Content: The dualview is a great concept but it's useless on this camera because the lens gives you an extreme fisheye effect if you're withing four feet of the subject.  So don't even bother trying to snap a picture of yourself.  Hard to believe anyone would try to sell a camera with such an obvious defect, but there it is.Also, the software crashed every time on my computer (a fairly new pc using windows 7).  And when I tried to contact customer service, they a) didn't even have a category for this camera, b) never got back to me with anything but spam.Never buying a Samsung product of any kind again.

ProductInfo.Features:
Take more accurate self-portraits with the enlarged 1.8in front-side display letting you see your self-portrait before you take it.
Flip the camera over and enjoy your pictures on its large 3.5in back-side display
ST600's 27mm wide angle lens with 5x optical zoom gives you a wider field of view
Smart Auto 2.0 (Still & Movie) instantly analyzes key elements of your composition then automatically adjusts itself
Capture the perfect shot with multitude of different photo modes and movie modes
A touch screen that gives clear feedback
1,152K high-resolution images through a 3.5in WVGA Touch Display
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung DualView ST600 14.2MP Compact Black Digital Camera
